articles.title: Live updates: Haley and DeSantis praise Trump as smiling ex-rival looks on - BBC.com
articles.description: The failed challengers for the Republican nomination voice full support for his candidacy in a clear display of unity at the party convention.
articles.content:
Brandon LivesayReporting from the convention
We're wrapping up our live coverage for the night here at day two of the Republican convention in Milwaukee.
